```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
prog.3aG5 <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/prog-3aG5.csv")
colnames(prog.3aG5)[1] <- 'Club'
colnames(prog.3aG5)[2] <- 'Punts.Projectats'
colnames(prog.3aG5)[3] <- 'Jornada'
prog.3aG5$Punts.Projectats <- round(prog.3aG5$Punts.Projectats, digits = 1)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(htmlwidgets)
plot <- ggplot(prog.3aG5,aes(Jornada,Punts.Projectats, color = Club)) + geom_line()
plot2 <- ggplotly(plot)
plot2 <- config(plot2, displayModeBar = FALSE)
plot2
```
